title: Pork taco
description: Fry up some cooked pork with peppers and spices to fill a tasty wrap, with salad and sour cream. A fun meal for four that makes leftovers go further.
ingredients: ½ tsp chilli powder (add more if you enjoy spicy food)
¼ head iceberg lettuce, finely shredded
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
